name: Frantic Cafe
description:
!!!! YOU CAN PLAY THIS GAME IN YOUR BROWSER, WEBGL AND A KEYBOARD AND MOUSE IS NEEDED TO RUN THIS GAME !!!!

!!!! PLEASE SWITCH TO A COMPUTER TO RUN THIS GAME

Navigate your way and serve customers in a cafe designed by a interior designer who hates you!

Made for TechCode's Peanut Jam (2/13/2022)

Music from Zapsplat (Zapsplat license)
